overview: Disc One: Max's First Job/Max Takes a Bath/Max Is Convalescent/Entente Cordiale/ Max's Tragedy/ Love Unconquerable/Max's Vacation/The Pedicure/Max and His Mother-in-Law  Disc Two: A recopilation of Max Linder's 3 most known films: "Seven Years Bad Luck" (1921), "Be My Wife" (1921) and "The Three Must-Get-Theres" (1922).
title: The Cinema of Max Linder
